translations: 独特的；无比的；无法仿效的

sentences.sentence: He makes his own point in his own inimitable way.
sentences.translation: 他以他独有的的方式阐述了自己的观点。

sentences.sentence: John related in his own inimitable way the story of his trip to Tibet.
sentences.translation: 约翰以他自己特有的方式讲述了他的西藏之行。

sentences.sentence: Could we render this inimitable picture properly, then would everybody exclaim, "Beautiful, unparalleled Italy!"
sentences.translation: 如果我们能把这幅独一无二的图画恰当地描绘出来，那么人人都会惊叹：“美丽无比的意大利！”
